name: Hellemental
description:
A Human lost its Soul and was sent to Hell as a Robot.

In order to regain humanity it must escape Hell.

Defeat all the Bosses to open the door to the next Level

Controls:

Move: WASD

MeeleAttack: Left Mouse Button

Ranged Attack: Right Mouse Button

Reset Level: Escape

Created in 10 days for the Nestalgia GameJam
